meanings.sent1: During the party, their gabs filled the room with laughter.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy our gabs about books and movies.
meanings.sent3: Their gabs about unicorns and dragons always make me smile.
meanings.sent4: Her gabs were like a bubbling brook, flowing endlessly.
meanings.sent5: The gabs at the family dinner were so lively, I'll never forget them.

meanings.sent1: The gabs of the students in the hallway disrupted the class.
meanings.sent2: I heard some gabs about a new restaurant opening in town.
meanings.sent3: The gabs of the birds outside my window woke me up early.
meanings.sent4: The gabs of the squirrels in the park sounded like a secret language.
meanings.sent5: The gabs of the old ladies at the park bench were a daily routine.

meanings.sent1: She gabs on the phone for hours every day.
meanings.sent2: He gabs about his weekend plans non-stop.
meanings.sent3: The parrot gabs all day, mimicking everyone in the house.
meanings.sent4: The river gabs as it rushes over the rocks.
meanings.sent5: The children gabs excitedly about their upcoming field trip.
